title: [Kat, Vi, Fiora, and Ruby], let's make some RWBY skins!
body:
RWBY is a great anime created by Rooster Teeth, check out here if you haven't watched before http://roosterteeth.com/archive/?sid=rwby&v=more. Surprisingly, characters in RWBY are really similar to some champions in league. Yang as {{champion:254}} , Blake as {{champion:55}} , Weiss as {{champion:114}} , and Ruby as {{champion:126}} ? Nvm he is a man, let's just create a new champion Ruby! I know it is going to cost a lot to buy the copyright from Rooster Teeth, but I think there are a lot of league players willing to buy those skins. It will be best if Riot changes the voices of those skins to the voices in RWBY. 
Comment if you like like this idea!

replies.body: honestly i think rooster teeth would allow the collaboration

> honestly i think rooster teeth would allow the collaboration

I think they really would.
Rooster Teeth earns money from copy right.
Riot earns from the skins.
Players are happy to pay for the skins.
3 win situation.
And RWBY gets more popularity so its a 4 win situation

> And RWBY gets more popularity so its a 4 win situation

More RWBY fans come to play league so its a 5 win.

and then more Anime based skins will rise so it is a countless win.

wait Super galaxy Rumble is based on Gurren Lagan... its a win ALREADY
Plus we already have skins based on videogames so ridiculous they are practically anime! (Looking at you Jetstream-Lightning: Yasuo)

You could even skin Jungle Creeps as grimm if you want to go really crazy, and I don't see a problem with the gender mismatch, just get new voice acting with the skin, that's pretty common anyway.  Also, I had Jayce picked for Nora

I don't know if a lot of people at RT play LoL. Most of the Achievement Hunters, Gus, and the office at large (to my understanding) prefer SMITE since it's a bit more "casual"/action-y. It might be up to Monty, but I don't think he has the time to play LoL. I don't think RT would be opposed to a collaboration, but I don't think they have strong feelings one way or another towards LoL; my general feeling is that there isn't tons of overlap between the RT community and the LoL community, at least not as much as say, Halo or Minecraft.
They did a Let's Play in it a while back, and they were totally clueless, but that doesn't have to stop skin making

I always said an actual Scythe wielding melee champion would be cool. Let alone one that has a gun in it an is a female. Make her an enemy of Jayce or something and have a similar kit switching between melee and ranged attacks.
9/10 would buy, except for Jayce. That would be disturbing to see.

> 9/10 would buy, except for Jayce. That would be disturbing to see.

Yea, Riot should create a new champion Ruby.
Or maybe just Akali since she has those scythe thingies.
But I think the main inspiration for the thought of Jayce was that Ruby's weapon is both a melee scythe and a gun. Jayce's weapon is currently the closest match.
I know, it's just "myah" you know? It'd be like Sailor Moon Mundo.
Sailor Moondo ??

Mundo goes where he pleases.

...though that would be an absolutely hilarious April fools skin.
Mundo bends where ever he pleases.
Well, if we want to make Jayce a female character from RWBY, I think we can all agree that it should be Nora.

Of course, ALL of their weapons are also guns.
Maybe Jayce would be better as Nora, who actually has a hammer.
My thoughts exactly
Anyone else see penny as irelia? How she fans out her blades and shoots them is pretty similar imo
I really don't think very many people will be interested in these skins aside from sheer looks. On that note, buying a copy right would probably result in negative profits.
They don't have to straight up buy it, they could come to an agreement to share profits from skins or such

This would give Riot incentive to finally make the cute scythe-girl champion that people have demanded for ~2 years now.

Also {{item:1028}} forever.

> This would give Riot incentive to finally make the cute scythe-girl champion that people have demanded for ~2 years now.
> 
> Also {{item:1028}} forever.

{{item:1028}}
Honestly I would buy the Yang skin.
Also should have a Sun Wukong skin for Wukong, based off the same legend after all
This should be done as a gift for the Money Oum who passed away. He's the creator of RWBY for those who don't know.
I couldn't agree more
I got a better idea, less anime based skins and more Pool party Katarina that's getting teased from 4 years now?
There are a lot of those tho. (Still waiting for Ahri's since she was in like 3 or 4 of the splash arts and Jinx's reveal)

Katarina was in both Ziggs and Fiora's... Ahri can wait her bloody turn... Seriously i expected her the last 100 times, but nooooo! Fiora and stuff like that are first... ofc... Lets make an ugly robot skin for Kat instead of an actually awesome pool party one...
i just find katarina i dont finde the others ther no  one with big hands like vi i think the one with sword is fiora
Yang has Gauntlets that are used very similarly to Vi, near perfect match in my opinion

that would be a really simple asset swap to skin yang in as vi

the scorpion type grimm is a Death Stalker, and dont forget about Grimm Anivia (Nevermore)
And yes, they should totally make a champ like Ruby, with her first extra skin being that of Ruby
I had the Grimm chalked in as a reskin of  the Jungle Creeps, Nevermore = Dragon, King Taku = Baron, etc.

roman as swain, neopolitan as leblanc :^), qrow could be yasuo, jaune could either be Ezreal or Leona (looks vs weapons), phyrra is panth, ren is lucian, Nora might be poppy, Ozpin is... Zilean? Comment ant more you think of, and if there are spoilers then please mark your comment as such, Thanks!!
Hopefully they continue the series. It would only be right to finish what the creator started.
Volume 3 has been reconfirmed post Monty, so it's happening, I'm both really excited and scared
I feel you there. I do hope it stays as good as it has been, but also I'm afraid of how it will turn out without monty there. I will miss him.
I think that {{champion:84}} is actually more similar to Blake than {{champion:55}}  is. Just cuase kat sounds like cat doesnt mean shes closer XD.
I can't think of a champion with a similar style to blake who has the shadow semblence covered, Shaco and Leblank are controllable copies, and Wukong is very much the wrong style
fiora is definately Wiess and Vi is definately like Yang. The others... not so much
Fiora covers the sword part of weiss, but her glyphs are far more versatile than Fiora's kit, so I'm torn
Why not make Cait a Ruby skin? I mean, she uses a sniper. Just model the gun after Crescent Rose's gun-mode. Am I right?
It misses the scythe combos that are awesome in the show, but it even covers the use of the kick for mobility with the net shot
